infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Cusco Go uses the camera to capture hunt items. Example: Take a photo of an Andean Condor to record a capture.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Cusco Go saves your captured photos to a 'Cusco Go' album in Photos so you can keep and share them. Example: After you photograph a condor, we add it to your Photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Cusco Go lets you choose existing photos from your library as captures. Example: Select a llama photo you've already taken.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Cusco Go uses your location to award biome bonus points to captures. Example: If a photo is taken in cloud forest, you may receive a bonus.
